name: ZZZZZZ (Zachu)
description:
PC Version Available Here: https://zachu.itch.io/zzzzzz-dowloadable-version
that version runs way better than this one.

This game was all about experimenting with new visual effects and experimenting with pixel graphics to see what is possible.

WASD - Move

Space-Jump/Double Jump

Shift on ground - Dash

Shift in air - Flip

Shift + Down - Slide
